short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds pitch accent information to entries in the online Japanese-English Dictionary at jisho.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The add-on currently uses pitch accent information from the Japanese-German dictionary wadoku and from the kanjium dataset. The data is already packaged in the add-on, so there will be no additional stress on the internet connection.
